judges: Before Jones, Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts and Pomeroy, JJ.

opinions.text:
Opinion
pee Curiam,
Judgment of sentence affirmed.
Former Mr. Chief Justice Bell and former Mr. Justice Babbieei took no part in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: pee Curiam,

attorneys: David Zwanets, with him Robert A. Rovner, for appellant.

Milton M. Stein, Assistant District Attorney, with him William P. Boland, Assistant District Attorney, James D. Crawford, Deputy District Attorney, Richard A. Sprague, First Assistant District Attorney, and Arlen Specter, District Attorney, for Commonwealth, appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Commonwealth v. Roberson, Appellant.
Argued November 9, 1971.
Before Jones, Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts and Pomeroy, JJ.
David Zwanets, with him Robert A. Rovner, for appellant.
Milton M. Stein, Assistant District Attorney, with him William P. Boland, Assistant District Attorney, James D. Crawford, Deputy District Attorney, Richard A. Sprague, First Assistant District Attorney, and Arlen Specter, District Attorney, for Commonwealth, appellee.
January 20, 1972:
